channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 London School of Economics on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Causal Dependence Plots
item.description: Causal Dependence Plots (CDPs) visualize how machine learning model predictions causally depend on input features, overcoming limitations of existing methods that ignore causal relationships.
